Class Subscriber

java.lang.Object
notification.Subscriber
class Subscriber extends Object

  • Field Summary

    Private variable containing the communication strategy of the subscriber

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Subscriber(String nom, String mode, String adr, CommunicationStrategy strategy)
    Constructor of the class, initializes a subscriber with his name, the mode of communication he has chosen for membership, the address to contact him in the chosen modality and the subject of the correct modality who will be responsible for sending alerts to him.

  • Constructor Details

    • Subscriber

      public Subscriber(String nom, String mode, String adr, CommunicationStrategy strategy)
      Constructor of the class, initializes a subscriber with his name, the mode of communication he has chosen for membership, the address to contact him in the chosen modality and the subject of the correct modality who will be responsible for sending alerts to him.
      Parameters:
      nom - name of the subscriber
      mode - communication mode chosen by the subscriber
      adr - address of the subscriber
      strategy - communication strategy of the subscriber
